original_title: Sesame Street: Sing Yourself Sillier at the Movies
overview: In a spoof of Siskel and Ebert's Sneak Previews, Telly and Oscar are seen in a movie theater, reviewing the silliest songs from Sesame Street. Telly loves all of them and he gives them 5 "Wows". Oscar, however, dislikes them and gives them 5 "Phooeys" (but ends up liking the last clip).
title: Sesame Street: Sing Yourself Sillier at the Movies
